title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu: Matsuri - Sentaku ni Yotte Tenkai ga Kawaru "LIPS Eizou"
synopsis: A promotional video that was shown to the public at Comiket 78, and uploaded to YouTube and posted on the official website. It was also included with the first Blu-ray/DVD volume of the Matsuri OVA.
staff: [['Inoue, Kenji', ['Original Creator']], ['Haga, Yui', ['Original Character Design']], ['Ooshima, Miwa', ['Character Design']]]
